images_classifiers.classifiers module¶

class images_classifiers.classifiers.NSFWClassifier[source]¶

Bases: images_classifiers.classifier.Classifier

Not Safe For Work Image (NSFW) Classifier.

This class classify an image if its NSFW or not. It uses the open sourced NSFW classifier model used by Yahoo converted to a Tensorflow network.

classify(image_data)[source]¶

Classify an image.

Parameters:image_data – An image bytes to classify.
Returns:The classifaction result.
load_image(image_data, is_jpeg)[source]¶
process_image(img, scale, isotropic, crop, mean)[source]¶

Crops, scales, and normalizes the given image.

Parameters:
  • img – The image to be processed.
  • scale – The image wil be first scaled to this size.
  • isotropic – If isotropic is true, the smaller side is rescaled to this, preserving the aspect ratio.
  • crop – After scaling, a central crop of this size is taken.
  • mean – Subtracted mean from the image.
Returns:

The image submited processed with the submitted parameters and the mean subtracted.
class images_classifiers.classifiers.SafeImageClassifier[source]¶

Bases: images_classifiers.classifier.Classifier

SafeImage Classifier.

This class classify an image if it has Safe Content or Not.
